projectDescription.one: Developed an iOS app to simplify access to NBA and WNBA content, addressing navigation challenges and enhancing user engagement.
projectDescription.two: Implemented communication tools for players, coaches, and recruiters, streamling the process and reducing communication delays.
projectDescription.three: Designed an SQL database to track player profiles, recruitment visits, and coach interactions, enabling easy data retrieval.

projectDescription.one: Developed and trained a custon Convolution Neural Network (CNN for image classification, achieving an accuracy of 97% on a dataset of 5,000+ images.
projectDescription.two: Implemented data augmentation techniques to improve model generalization, reducing overfitting by 10%.
projectDescription.three: Utilized performance metrics (accuracy, precision, recall) to continuously optimize and assess model effectiveness.

projectDescription.one: Developed a web application for recruiting underrepresented high school football players.
projectDescription.two: Implemented communication tools for players, coaches, and recruiters, streamlining the process and reducing communication delays.
projectDescription.three: Designed a SQL database to track player profiles, recruitment visits, and coach interactions, enabling easy data retrieval.
